mapper.update: update consignee_sendperson set name=#{name}, province=#{province} , city=#{city} ,district=#{district} , street_address=#{streetAddress} , zip_code=#{zipCode} , phone=#{phone}, email=#{email} , company=#{company} , modify_date=#{modifyDate} where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from consignee_sendperson where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from consignee_sendperson where user_id=#{userId} and (name like #{key} or province like #{key} or city like #{key} or district like #{key} or street_address like #{key} or phone like #{key} or email like #{key} or company like #{key} or zip_code like #{key})

select * from consignee_sendperson where user_id=#{userId} and (name like #{key} or province like #{key} or city like #{key} or district like #{key} or street_address like #{key} or phone like #{key} or email like #{key} or company like #{key} or zip_code like #{key}) order by `consignee_sendperson`.create_date desc limit #{index},#{size}
select * from consignee_sendperson where id=#{id} and user_id=#{userId}
select count(*) from consignee_sendperson where user_id=#{userId} and phone=#{phone}
